mapper.select: select a.*,b.customer_id,b.customer_name,c.name as type_name,d.name as status_name, (select count(1) from wk_crm_business_user_star where business_id = a.business_id and user_id = #{userId}) as star from wk_crm_business as a left join wk_crm_customer as b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id left join wk_crm_business_type as c on a.type_id = c.type_id left join wk_crm_business_status as d on a.status_id = d.status_id where a.business_id = #{id}

select (select count(a.contacts_id) from wk_crm_contacts_business a inner join `wk_crm_contacts` b on a.contacts_id = b.contacts_id where a.business_id = #{businessId} ${contactsConditions}) as contactCount, (select count(*) from wk_crm_contract where business_id = #{businessId} and check_status != 7 ${conditions}) as contractCount, count(*) as productCount from wk_crm_business_product where business_id = #{businessId}

select b.product_id,b.name,b.name as productName,c.name as category_name,a.price,a.sales_price,a.num,a.discount,a.subtotal,(select value from `wk_crm_product_data` as d where d.batch_id = b.batch_id and d.name = 'unit') as 'unit',(select value from `wk_crm_product_data` as d where d.batch_id = b.batch_id and d.name = '是否上下架') as '是否上下架' from wk_crm_business_product as a inner join wk_crm_product as b on a.product_id = b.product_id left join wk_crm_product_category as c on b.category_id = c.category_id where a.business_id = #{businessId}

select a.contract_id,a.num,a.name as contract_name,b.customer_name,a.money,a.start_time,a.end_time,a.received_money,a.unreceived_money,a.check_status from wk_crm_contract as a left join wk_crm_customer as b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id where a.business_id = #{businessId} and a.check_status != 7 ${conditions}

select date_format(deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as time from `wk_crm_business` where status != 3 and owner_user_id = #{data.userId} and deal_date between #{data.startTime} and #{data.endTime} group by date_format(deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
select business_id from `wk_crm_business` where status != 3 and owner_user_id = #{userId} and to_days(deal_date) = to_days(#{time})

select date_format(next_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as time from `wk_crm_business` where status != 3 and owner_user_id = #{data.userId} and next_time between #{data.startTime} and #{data.endTime} group by date_format(next_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
select business_id from `wk_crm_business` where status != 3 and owner_user_id = #{userId} and to_days(next_time) = to_days(#{time})
